definitions.text: a public official authorized to decide questions brought before a court of justice
an authority who is able to estimate worth or quality

examples: I cannot judge some works of modern art
How do you evaluate this grant proposal?
We shouldn't pass judgment on other people

definitions.text: judge tentatively or form an estimate of (quantities or time)
examples: I estimate this chicken to weigh three pounds
They labeled him unfit to work here

definitions.text: put on trial or hear a case and sit as the judge at the trial of
examples: The football star was tried for the murder of his wife
The judge tried both father and son in separate trials
